text: The West Coast is lighting up today with clean 3 ft @11s WNW swell and light E winds at 11 mph. Ardnave Bay and Saligo Bay are your top picks, both offering fun conditions throughout the day. Tomorrow sees a drop to 2 ft @9s, still workable but with fresh E winds at 17 mph. By the day after, conditions remain similar with 2 ft @7s, but only Dunaverty shows any promise. Best: today.
